original_title: Lil’ Yogis Yoga Class: Flying Like an Eagle
overview: It's time for yoga class! Join the Lil' Yogis as they learn basic yoga poses for children. Catch the love of yoga at an early age with this simple instructional video where kids learn the eagle pose. Let's learn with Lil’ Yogis Yoga Class: Flying Like An Eagle, Namaste!
title: Lil’ Yogis Yoga Class: Flying Like an Eagle
